text: "Dancing with Tears in My Eyes" is a 1984 song by British new wave band Ultravox and is the second single from their seventh studio album Lament. It went to number 2 in Belgium, number 3 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in the Netherlands and Poland, number 7 in Germany, number 8 in Ireland, number 16 in Switzerland, number 36 in France and number 38 in New Zealand. It failed to chart in the United States. ==Track listing== ===7" vinyl=== ===12" vinyl (UK and Europe)=== ===12" vinyl (North America)=== ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:Ultravox songs
title: Dancing with Tears in My Eyes
